monitoringFormulaData.formulaText: HICSC345_1=#F(D44) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_1 X [MWCSC345_1 X TCSC345_1 / (MWCSC345_1 X TCSC345_1 + MWCSC345_2 X TCSC345_2 + MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)]
HICSC12_1=#F(D14) X TCSC12 / TCSC12_1 X [MWCSC12_1 X TCSC12_1 / (MWCSC12_1 X TCSC12_1 + MWCSC12_2 X TCSC12_2)]
HICSC345_2=#F(D44) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_2 X [MWCSC345_2 X TCSC345_2 / (MWCSC345_1 X TCSC345_1 + MWCSC345_2 X TCSC345_2 + MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)]
HICSC12_2=#F(D14) X TCSC12 / TCSC12_2 X [MWCSC12_2 X TCSC12_2 / (MWCSC12_1 X TCSC12_1 + MWCSC12_2 X TCSC12_2)]
HI3=#F(D44) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_3 X [MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 / (MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)]
HI3=#F(D44) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_3 X [MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 / (MWCSC345_1 X TCSC345_1 + MWCSC345_2 X TCSC345_2 + MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)]
HI4=F#(D4) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_4 X [MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 / (MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)]

HI4=F#(D4) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_4 X [MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 / (MWCSC345_1 X TMWCSC345_1 X TCSC345_1 + MWCSC345_2 X TCSC345_2 + MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)]
HI5=F#(D44) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_5 X [MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5 / (MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)

HI5=F#(D44) X TCSC345 / TCSC345_5 X [MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5 / (MWCSC345_1 X TMWCSC345_1 X TCSC345_1 + MWCSC345_2 X TCSC345_2 + MWCSC345_3 X TCSC345_3 + MWCSC345_4 X TCSC345_4 + MWCSC345_5 X TCSC345_5)
